description: Emphysema is a chronic lung condition characterized by the destruction of the air sacs in the lungs, leading to difficulty in breathing.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: The presence or absence of emphysema.

values.name: Present
values.description: Emphysema is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: Emphysema is absent.

values.name: Centrilobular
values.description: Emphysema affects the central part of the lobule.

values.name: Panlobular
values.description: Emphysema affects the entire lobule.

values.name: Paraseptal
values.description: Emphysema affects the distal parts of the lobule.

values.name: Bullous
values.description: Emphysema causes bullae (large air spaces) to form in the lung.

values.name: Irregular
values.description: Emphysema has irregularly distributed areas of destruction.

values.name: Subpleural
values.description: Emphysema is predominantly located near the pleura.

values.name: Mild
values.description: Emphysema is mild.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: Emphysema is moderate.

values.name: Severe
values.description: Emphysema is severe.

values.name: Very Severe
values.description: Emphysema is very severe.

values.name: Extensive
values.description: Emphysema is extensive.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: The location of emphysema in the lungs.

values.name: Upper Lobes
values.description: Emphysema is located in the upper lobes of the lungs.

values.name: Lower Lobes
values.description: Emphysema is located in the lower lobes of the lungs.

values.name: Diffuse
values.description: Emphysema is distributed throughout the lungs.

values.name: Peribronchovascular
values.description: Emphysema is located around the bronchovascular bundles.

values.name: Apex to Base
values.description: Emphysema is distributed from the apex to the base of the lungs.

values.name: Right
values.description: Emphysema is localized to the right lung.

values.name: Left
values.description: Emphysema is localized to the left lung.

values.name: Bilateral
values.description: Emphysema is present in both lungs.

values.name: Predominant Side
values.description: Emphysema is predominantly located on one side.

values.name: Air trapping
values.description: Emphysema is associated with air trapping.

values.name: Pulmonary nodules
values.description: Emphysema is associated with pulmonary nodules.

values.name: Fibrosis
values.description: Emphysema is associated with fibrosis.

values.name: Pleural abnormalities
values.description: Emphysema is associated with pleural abnormalities.

values.name: Bronchiectasis
values.description: Emphysema is associated with bronchiectasis.
